ComicInfo.Title: Betrayal 8
ComicInfo.Summary: The Trojan War begins! The first battle between the Trojans and the Achaeans starts when Iolaus leads the Achaean army to Troy's south bay. This issue features lots of ships, lots of armor, lots of chariots, and lots of blood as the two armies clash.Achilles faces a gruesome duel to the death with the albino Kyknos, King of Kolonae. Kassandra interrupts the wedding of Hektor and Andromache, screaming her endless warnings of disaster which do no good. And Sarpedon of Lykia at last joins the cast with his army, although he's not referred to by name in this issue.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2025-01-02 17:43:46. [CVDB142868]
ComicInfo.Characters: Achilles, Agamemnon, Calchas, Cassandra of Troy, Hektor of Troy, Helen of Troy, Iolaus, Menelaus, Palamedes, Paris of Troy, Patroclus, Priam
